    \draw[dashed, fill=white] (1,2.5) circle (5pt);

    \draw[fill=black] (1,0) circle (5pt);
	\draw [decorate, magenta, decoration={snake}, ->] (1,1.25) --
    node [below,sloped]{$h\nu$} ++(1,0); 
\end{scope}

\begin{scope}[xshift=3cm]

\end{scope}
